name: Fall Blau
description:
Welcome to the first public test of Fall Blau!

This is a passion project of mine that's being constantly worked on and improved. If you do decide to download it, keep in mind that a lot of the stuff you may see is very early and/or work in progress, and does not represent the final look/feel of the game.

Fall Blau is a singleplayer story-driven experience that follows Ernst Kleid, a soldier in the german Wehrmacht during operation Fall Blau, up to the battle of Stalingrad.

If you're interested in the project and would like to join our discord to chat, give feedback, and talk with some awesome people, feel free!

Join here: https://discord.gg/xWgdyQ7

Controls are as follows:

Move [W, A, S, D]

Lean [E, D]

Interact [F]

Fire Weapon [Left Mouse Button]

Aim Down Sights [Right Mouse Button]

Reload [R]
